H0.text: What island would you come to first if you travelled due east from Bangladesh. Borneo

H1.text: What island would you come to first if you travelled due east from Bangladesh. Sulawesi

H2.text: What island would you come to first if you travelled due east from Bangladesh. Java

H3.text: What island would you come to first if you travelled due east from Bangladesh. 臺灣

A6.text: The Andaman Sea is separated from the Bay of Bengal by the Andaman and Nicobar Islands.

A7.text: Bangladesh has a coastline on the northern littoral of the Bay of Bengal.

A8.text: Bangladesh borders the Bay of Bengal along its southern coast.

A9.text: The southern maritime boundary follows coordinates marked by both Myanmar and Thailand towards the maritime tripoint with India's Andaman and Nicobar Islands.

A10.text: The Andaman and Nicobar Islands are located between Bangladesh and the Andaman Sea.
